nodes.text: The Lucid Voice was a modified Trade Federation Providence-class carrier/destroyer that saw service with the Confederate Navy during the Clone Wars. The vessel was colored a medium blue, with subtle red bow stripes.

The Lucid Voice was a sister ship to General Grievous's flagship, the Invisible Hand, and—along with the Colicoid Swarm—was used to intimidate worlds that were loyal to the Republic into surrendering. With the Voice's blue coloring, the ship was similar enough to the Hand in all but its bow striping—which was different from the Hand's yellow markings. This led victimized worlds into believing that they were being attacked by the Invisible Hand—and therefore Grievous himself.
